すっぱり: (すぱり) - completely (quitting, etc.)/entirely/thoroughly/totally/wholly/without hesitation; cleanly (cutting, snapping off, etc.)/in a single blow
すっぱ抜き: (すっぱぬき) - exposure; disclosure; exposé; revelation
すっぱ抜く: (すっぱぬく) - to expose; to disclose; to unmask
すっぽかす: (すっぽかす) - to stand (someone) up; to leave (something) undone; to neglect (a duty)
すっぽり: (ずっぽし) - (esp. when being covered in something) entirely/completely; (esp. when something is inserted or removed) cleanly/snugly
すっぽんぽん: (すっぽんぽん) - utterly stark naked; wearing only one's birthday suit
すっぽ抜ける: (すっぽぬける) - to slip out (e.g. from one's fingers); to cleanly forget
すっ裸: (すっぱだか) - nudity; stark naked/in one's bare skin; penniless
すっ転ぶ: (すっころぶ) - to (dramatically) fall over; to fall flat
すっ飛ぶ: (すっとぶ) - to rush off; to rush away; to vanish
すばしこい: (すばしっこい) - nimble; smart; quick
すばしっこい: (すばしっこい) - nimble; smart; quick
すぱっと: (すぱっと) - completely (quitting, etc.)/entirely/thoroughly/totally/wholly/without hesitation; cleanly (cutting, snapping off, etc.)/in a single blow
すぱり: (すぱり) - completely (quitting, etc.)/entirely/thoroughly/totally/wholly/without hesitation; cleanly (cutting, snapping off, etc.)/in a single blow
すべからず: (すべからず) - (combination of する and 可からず)  must not do; should not do; do not do
すべく: (すべく) - (contraction of するべく) in order to do; for the purpose of doing
すべし: (すべし) - (abbr. of suru and beshi)  should do; ought to do
すべた: (すべた) - bitch (por: espada)/witch/ugly woman/dog; (orig. meaning, referring to the card suit "spades")  normal card/card having only a floral pattern that gives a player only one point
すべり台: (すべりだい) - (playground) slide; (ship) launching platform/sliding bed
すぽっと: (スポッと) - snugly (into hole, container, etc.)/tightly (fitting, covering)/firmly; (with a) pop (i.e. sound of a cork, etc. being pulled out of a hole in one movement)
すぽん: (スポン) - snugly (into hole, container, etc.)/tightly (fitting, covering)/firmly; (with a) pop (i.e. sound of a cork, etc. being pulled out of a hole in one movement)
すまし込む: (すましこむ) - to put on airs; to affect (importance, etc.); to look wise
すまじき: (すまじき) - should not be done; must not be done
すまじきものは宮仕え: (すまじきものはみやづかえ) - wretched is the lot of a government official; it is better to work for oneself than to work for someone else
すまへん: (すみまへん) - sorry; excuse me; thank you
すまらん: (すまらん) - Excuse me (coll. form of sumaranai)
すみまへん: (すみまへん) - sorry; excuse me; thank you
すみま千円: (すみませんえん) - (joc)  sorry; excuse me; thank you
すやすや: (すやすや) - sleeping peacefully; sleeping quietly; sleeping soundly
すら: (すら) - even; if only; if just; as long as; the only thing needed
すらも: (すらも) - even; if only; if just; as long as; the only thing needed
すらり: (すらり) - long, slender and well-proportioned; smooth, continuous (movement)
すり付ける: (すりつける) - to rub on/to rub against/to wipe on/to nuzzle against (e.g. dog nosing a person); (なすりつける only) to lay the blame on; (すりつける, こすりつける only) to strike (a match)
すり合せ: (すりあわせ) - comparing and adjusting/reconciling/knocking into shape/bouncing of ideas, opinions, etc. off each other to obtain a fine-tuned integrated whole; {engr} lapping/precision surface finishing/mating by rubbing together; {med} margination
すり合せる: (すりあわせる) - to rub together; to reconcile (ideas, proposals, plans)/to compare and adjust
すり合わせ: (すりあわせ) - comparing and adjusting/reconciling/knocking into shape/bouncing of ideas, opinions, etc. off each other to obtain a fine-tuned integrated whole; {engr} lapping/precision surface finishing/mating by rubbing together; {med} margination
すり合わせる: (すりあわせる) - to rub together; to reconcile (ideas, proposals, plans)/to compare and adjust
すり寄る: (すりよる) - to draw close to; to edge up to; to snuggle up to; to nestle close to; to cuddle with; to draw closer to
すり抜ける: (すりぬける) - to slip through; to make one's way through quickly
すり替える: (すりかえる) - to switch (secretly); to substitute; to sidestep (an issue)
すり流し: (すりながし) - ground soup; ground seafood, beans, nuts, etc. seasoned and mixed with broth
すり減らす: (すりへらす) - to wear away; to rub down; to abrade
すり減る: (すりへる) - to be worn down; to be reduced
すり潰す: (すりつぶす) - to mash/to grind/to pulverize/to pulverise/to deface; to dissipate (a fortune)/to run through/to lose
すり衣: (すりぎぬ) - plain white clothing patterned using dyes
すり足: (すりあし) - sliding feet/shuffling (one's feet); {sumo} moving legs forward with feet never leaving the ground (exercise)
すり身: (すりみ) - surimi; minced fish (or meat) mashed into a paste
すり込む: (すりこむ) - to rub in; to grind and mix
するがいい: (するがいい) - (exp,adj-ix) had better ...; may as well ...
するが良い: (するがよい) - had better ...; may as well ...
するべき: (するべき) - (longer form of すべき) should do; ought to do
するよろし: (するよろし) - had better ...; may as well ...
するり: (するり) - with a smooth, unhindered motion; speedily and without delay
する事なす事: (することなすこと) - everything one does
すれば: (すれば) - if so; in that case; in that situation
すればするほど: (すればするほど) - the more you do (it), the... (i.e. "the more you drink, the better it tastes")
すれ違い: (すれちがい) - passing each other; crossing paths without meeting; being at cross purposes
すれ違う: (すれちがう) - to pass by one another; to disagree; to miss each other
すんごい: (すんごい) - terrible; dreadful; terrific; amazing; great; wonderful; to a great extent
すんごく: (すんごく) - (emphatic form of すごく)  awfully; very; immensely
すんづくり: (すんづくり) - kanji sun ("inch") radical at right (radical 41)
すんでの所で: (すんでのところで) - almost; very nearly
すんなり: (すんなり) - slim/slender/lithe/supple; smoothly/without resistance/without trouble/without difficulty/without dissent/easily/readily
すんません: (すんません) - sorry; excuse me; thank you
すんまへん: (すみまへん) - sorry; excuse me; thank you
すーすー: (すーすー) - cool sensation from passing air; sound of air leaking
す可き: (すべき) - should do (abbr. of suru+beki); ought to do
す巻: (すまき) - wrapping something in a bamboo mat; wrapping somebody in a bamboo mat and throwing him in a river (Edo period unofficial punishment)
ずうずう弁: (ずうずうべん) - thick Tohoku accent (wherein some "j" sounds become "z" sounds)
ずうっと: (ずうっと) - (ずーっと and ずうっと are more emphatic) continuously in some state (for a long time, distance)/throughout/all along/the whole time/all the way; much (better, etc.)/by far/far and away; far away/long ago; direct/straight
ずく: (ずく) - putting oneself into something; exerting oneself
ずく無し: (ずくなし) - bum; slacker; good-for-nothing; loser
ずしずし: (ずしずし) - thump; thud (sound representing the footfalls of something heavy)
